Deb.phrase: Hi, I'm Deb. I make the compost around these parts with my sister.

replies.phrase: What's with the bucket of worms?

Deb.phrase: You can turn junk and seeds into compost, right here in this bucket!

replies.phrase: Neato, I sure wish I had some junk!

Deb.phrase: Here, I have some junk in my pockets. Put it in the compost bucket!
Sure, get me some junk and I can help the other farmers grow some serious vegetables!

replies.phrase: I can get you 20 junk for 50 coins.
I don't think I can do that just yet, sorry.

Deb.phrase: Thanks so much! I'll put that junk to good use!

Rick.phrase: Howdy buddy, I'm Rick but people 'round here call me Cowboy Rick, I'm a strawberry farmer.

replies.phrase: Hi Rick ... I mean Cowboy Rick
What do you know about the landlord? How do we keep Cloudy going?

Rick.phrase: Do you want a few strawberries?
Here you go. be sure to water them with a sprinkler.
Cloudy is a simple place. We try to farm and sell anything extra. That man knows we ain't got the ability to make that kind of money...
I only got a few left, I had to sell a bunch at the market just to do my part in paying for cloudy meadows
If you take the bridge above meb and deb you'll be at the market, a place to sell and buy most things you'll need.

Meb.phrase: Hi, im Meb, I know she got the better name.
Did you know placing compost on dirt helps create a grass tile which has rich soil ready for your hoe.

replies.phrase: Why do the plots turn to dirt?

Meb.phrase: Thats just what happens when you leave a plot open to the air for too long.

Mario.phrase: I may be the local plumber, but I don't take crap from anybody.

Garry.phrase: Hi, I'm Garry, and I'm very tired so please leave me alone.

replies.phrase: But why do you sleep so much?

Garry.phrase: Cause I got nothing better to do since I don't know how to farm, so I just watch time pass me by, now leave me alone.

replies.phrase: Why are you wearing that dress then?

Mira.phrase: Cause I rode that graceful air balloon over to the left
Ride the air balloon over to the park and then come tell me what you saw - I'll give you a flower
Head to Poly Park today and then come back to tell me about it!

OldManJ.phrase: I Heard you're gonna try to save Cloudy Meadows. I may not be able to help much at my old age, but I'm here if you need any advice!
What do you want to know about?
Try eating some of that corn you have and plant the seeds. I also heard that the man west of your farm has some extra strawberries!

replies.phrase: Thanks, can you help with something else?

OldManJ.phrase: First seeds, you can get by buying them or eating crops. Then you grab a hoe to a patch of grass to till it. After you that plant the seeds and wait.

replies.phrase: Thanks, can you help with something else?

OldManJ.phrase: Press Q to eat food! You'll die if you go hungry, so make sure you've always got food on you.

replies.phrase: Thanks, can you help with something else?

OldManJ.phrase: Strawberries, Tomatoes, and Watermelons need water to grow properly. You buy sprinklers in the market. Then, stand on grass and press E.

replies.phrase: Thanks, can you help with something else?

OldManJ.phrase: I don't know much about farming robots, but I heard there is a big automated farm somewhere in the park. You can get there by airship.

replies.phrase: Thanks, can you help with something else?

Brandon.phrase: I love ladybugs I have made so much more corn thanks to them, although they do leave after they eat all my grass.

Brent.phrase: Oh geez, man! Oh gosh so many coins, what if we lose Cloudy Meadows?!

replies.phrase: Anything I can do to help?

Brent.phrase: How does it look? Bad bad bad! Oh geez man, what am I gonna do?

replies.phrase: I'm gonna let you cool off.

Brent.phrase: Yeah man, I am full on freaking out!
Go to Poly Park and tell my mom that I might need a place to stay.

replies.phrase: I don't know where that is.
I can't help right now, sorry.

Brent.phrase: Thanks, my mom will know what to do, she is my superhero.
You might want to take the airship head left for awhile you can't miss it
So do you think you can help me?

replies.phrase: I can't help right now, sorry.

Brent.phrase: As promised, here are some carrots!

BlindPete.phrase: Can you move the rock that sits at the market, I keep running into it

replies.phrase: When I have enough money, Sure.

BlindPete.phrase: Idk how it got there but i've heard there are some really big grass plots over there

replies.phrase: Oh now I want to move it.

BlindPete.phrase: Much appreciated! You made my day!

replies.phrase: Liam sent you a love letter

James.phrase: The red cart on the bottom is where we put anything we want to sell.

replies.phrase: Tell me more about the market please.

James.phrase: There are carts for vegetables fruits and insects, they run out of stock but they'll fill back up every day or so.

replies.phrase: Thanks, that was super helpful James.

James.phrase: A love letter from Liam? Thanks for telling me. Thanks for your help, take cherry.

replies.phrase: Hi Liam, anything I can do to help?

Liam.phrase: I love James, can you give him this love letter for me?

replies.phrase: What do I look like, your love letter collector? I have other things to do.
No sorry I can't do that right now.

Liam.phrase: James likes to hang out in the market. Blonde hair, hot bod can't miss him
Ok but please deliver it today.

goals.reply_phrase: Liam sent you a love letter

Liam.phrase: Thanks so much! As a little gift, have this cherry!

Zoda.phrase: Hi, I’m Zoda, I’d call myself a robot expert. Need to know anything?
Well what do you wanna know about?

replies.phrase: What does the color of the floppy mean?
How do I make them farm?

Zoda.phrase: Well you need a robot of your own, I can give you one of my favorite robots if you do a couple things for me, I'll give you a lvl 1 robot.

replies.phrase: WHA why is a lvl 1 your favorite?

Zoda.phrase: Robots come in 3 levels, lvl 1 has the smallest inv and instruction space, then each level just adds space to both.
Lvl1 recharges with Veggie Oil that you get from a press, Lvl2 recharges when standing on a sprinkler, Lvl3 runs off sunlight
Well can't you see my entire farm runs off of robots?
Red Floppys are for movement based commands, Blue Floppys are for item based commands, and Green Floppys are for logic based commands.
The pc will program a few floppy disks into one golden floppy disk, all you gotta do is put a gold floppy in the pc and add what you want.
The easiest way to learn how to program them would be to just go look at my robots, They range from simple hoeing, to complex farming systems.
Sadly plants don't like it when something stands on them so they won't grow.

replies.phrase: Cloud meadows could use a super heros help right now

Super Tina.phrase: Well, let me know if I can help you.

replies.phrase: I don't need help right now super tina.

Super Tina.phrase: I’ve been told that ladybugs increase how much product your crops produce, but the effect doesn't cross bridges.
Brent needs help? I am on my way!

Guy.phrase: These here part sure are nice
These here part sure are nice Buy all the seeds you want
Well I guess I just have everything a GUY could need
As promised, here's that level 1 robot!

Vinny.phrase: Do you want to have an issue with me kid
It’s my own personal market, now buy something or get lost!

Kenny.phrase: Hi, im Kenny I am just hanging in the swamp I don't live here
Fireflies make it really easy to see what is happening in the swamp
Yep to be honest there is not much to do in the swamp, any reason your here?

Ishmil.phrase: Yea I don't like pants man their prisons for your body

replies.phrase: that's a bit weird but I can respect it
I can see your penis, yea no Bye.

Ishmil.phrase: I only have one piece of clothing left I'll give it to you if you help me out

replies.phrase: My mom always said not to talk to naked strangers bye

Ishmil.phrase: I really need a veggie press

David.phrase: If you look really closely you can see frogs jumping around, for some reason nobody ever steps on them

Adam.phrase: I'm already late for my business appointment, I guess the restaurant to the left will do, they sell big plates of food

replies.phrase: A big plate of food sounds really good.

Barry.phrase: I can't wait for the skate park to be done
Man I am hungry I have had like 8 hotdogs today
Yea thank god for socialized medicine

Mr.C.phrase: I'm gonna buy this place and make all the buildings even taller, so yall better move out my way!

replies.phrase: How much are you buying it for?

Mr.C.phrase: It's gonna cost me $10,000 and there is no way you people are gonna be able to make that much! Not even in 100 days.
I really don't even care you guys are losers
Y'all better start packing cause imma come wrecking

Sarah.phrase: Hi! I'm Sarah, a fashion designer. I love helping people express their style in the big city!

replies.phrase: What kind of fashion do you design?

Sarah.phrase: Everything from casual streetwear to elegant evening wear. I believe everyone deserves to feel confident in what they wear!
Fashion is my passion! It's all about creativity and making people feel good about themselves.

Marcus.phrase: Hey there! Welcome to my cafe. I serve the best coffee and pastries in the city!
Of course! My espresso is legendary. Just watch out, it packs a punch!
Thanks! I put a lot of care into this place. It's my sanctuary in the busy city.

Elena.phrase: Hello! I'm Elena, a street artist. I create murals all over the city to bring color and life to these walls!
Thank you so much! That means a lot. I believe art should be accessible to everyone.
Everything around me! The people, the buildings, nature... the city is full of stories waiting to be painted.

Thomas.phrase: Hey, I'm Thomas, a taxi driver. Been driving around this city for years—I know every street!
Always! Fair rates and safe rides. That's my motto.
You bet! I've picked up people from all walks of life. Each person has their own story.

replies.phrase: I'd love to hear some stories!

Victoria.phrase: Welcome! I'm Victoria, owner of the upscale restaurant here. We serve gourmet cuisine!
We specialize in French and Italian cuisine, all prepared with the finest ingredients.
It is! Elegance and quality are our standards. Come dine with us sometime!

Dante.phrase: Ciao! I'm Dante, head chef. I prepare the finest dishes in the city!
Modern fusion cuisine! I blend traditional techniques with creative new flavors. Every dish is an experience!

Kai.phrase: Hello! I'm Kai, a city guide and travel blogger. I help visitors discover the best of the city!
Sure! Start with the markets, hit up a local cafe, catch some street art, and enjoy the evening energy!
The hidden rooftop gardens! Most tourists miss them, but they're peaceful and beautiful.
